definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Drink plenty of water and use a humidifier.
sentences.chinese: 喝足够的水并使用加湿器。

sentences.english: Keep mask in my coat pocket, humidifier by my bed.
sentences.chinese: 外套口袋里备有口罩，床边备有空气加湿器。

sentences.english: Piezoelectric ceramic is used widely for ultrasonic atomizer, humidifier, medical atomizing, etc.
sentences.chinese: 用于超声波雾化器，加湿器和某些医疗器械。

sentences.english: The work of dry steam humidifier features.
sentences.chinese: 干蒸加湿器的工作特点。

sentences.english: In general, cool-mist humidifiers are recommended over vaporizers .
sentences.chinese: 总之，冷雾加湿器更值得推荐。

sentences.english: The best thing to do would be to have a humidifier at home.
sentences.chinese: 最好的办法就是为家里添置一台加湿器。

sentences.english: The moisturizer we deal in was awarded a gold medal at an international exposition.
sentences.chinese: 我们的加湿器曾获得国际博览会金奖。

sentences.english: Humidifiers also can be used at home to the indoor wetting.
sentences.chinese: 家里也可以用加湿器给室内加湿。

sentences.english: Check the water within the humidifier, and keep it in the control scale range.
sentences.chinese: 检查加湿器的水量，使其保持在控制刻度范围内。

sentences.english: The cute frog humidifier operates with cold tap water.
sentences.chinese: 可爱的青蛙加湿器的运作与冷自来水。

sentences.english: Humidifier. With or without valve can be specified.
sentences.chinese: 加湿器可指定带有阀门或没有阀门。

sentences.english: This can be in lieu of having to buy a humidifier and leaving it running.
sentences.chinese: 这样可以代替不必买个加湿器而且让它不停地开着。

definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
